document.full_text: a convicted bank robber newly released from prison has been formally charged with a botched attempt to set off a fire bomb in a crowded shopping mall near columbine high school last week, on the 12th anniversary of the school massacre.
document.title: arson charge filed in botched bombing near columbine
lines_and_colors: a convicted bank robber newly released from prison has been formally charged with a botched attempt to set off a fire bomb in a crowded shopping mall near columbine high school last week, on the 12th anniversary of the school massacre.
